page.title: 03Trade
page.content: Although orginally a small town,with only one shopping area,as Swanley's housing development grew,so did the needs of the people. Phase one of Swanley's precinct was begun and it consisted of a varied selection of small shops,plus a bank,doctors surgery ,Woolworths,Boots,the Co-op and International. Phase two mainly consisted of an Asda superstore.This provides a wide range of goods. Eventually phase three will begin,but we don't know what it consists of because construction has been delayed. Wednesday is Market day.It is popular ,but many people would like more produce stalls. We conducted a survey and most residents seemed satisfied with Swanley's shopping facilties,but many women wanted more clothes,shoe shops.
